content.webTitle: One dead as Stockholm explosions hit shoppers

fields.headline: One dead as Stockholm explosions hit shoppers
fields.bodyText: At least one person was killed and two were injured today in two explosions in central Stockholm that caused panic among Christmas shoppers. A car parked near a busy street exploded and a second blast occurred a short distance away, police said. Authorities raised the terror threat alert level in October, and Swedish security officials have warned that radicalised young people have travelled abroad to join Islamist insurgencies.
